***дурачок.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дурачок.html>дурачок</a> (6952)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурак.html>дура́к</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">durák</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о́к</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ók</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурачок.html>дурачо́к</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">duračók</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурачок.html>дурачка́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурачок.html>дурачки́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурачок.html>дурачко́в</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурочка.html>ду́рочка</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>Diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурак.html>дура́к</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">durák</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:fool.html>fool</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:idiot.html>idiot</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:imbecile.html>imbecile</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ду<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ра<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>чо́к</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дур-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ач-ок</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***дурень.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:рыжий.html>дурень</a> (16237)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:рыжий.html>ду́рень</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dúrenʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурень.html>ду́рня</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурень.html>ду́рни</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурень.html>ду́рней</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:fool.html>fool</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:idiot.html>idiot</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:imbecile.html>imbecile</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:person.html>person</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:poor.html>poor</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:judgement.html>judgement</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:little.html>little</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:intelligence.html>intelligence</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ду́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>рень</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 2*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дур-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ень</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>ду<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ре́ть</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:одуреть.html>одуре́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дур-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:dan.html>-е</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***дурить.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дурить.html>дури́ть</a> (17472)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*duriti</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурить.html>дури́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">durítʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:frolic.html>frolic</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:play.html>play</a> pranks, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>be</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:naughty.html>naughty</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:behave.html>behave</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:like.html>like</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:fool.html>fool</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дурь.html>дури</a>!</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ne.html>ne</a> duri!</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:don.html>don</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:t.html>t</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>be</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:foolish.html>foolish</a>!; <a href = vnd.unilang:don.html>don</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:t.html>t</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:make.html>make</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:fool.html>fool</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> yourself!</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>be</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:obstinate.html>obstinate</a></li>

<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дурить.html>дури́ть</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:голова.html>голову</a> кому́-либо</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>durítʹ</b> golovu komú-libo</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:confuse.html>confuse</a> smb; <a href = vnd.unilang:mix.html>mix</a> smb <a href = vnd.unilang:up.html>up</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурь.html>дурь</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">durʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дуреть.html>дуре́ть</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">durétʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:одуреть.html>одуре́ть</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect"><a href = vnd.unilang:pf.html>pf</a></abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">odurétʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурак.html>дура́к</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">durák</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурачок.html>дурачо́к</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">duračók</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дура.html>ду́ра</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dúra</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурацкий.html>дура́цкий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">duráckij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурной.html>дурно́й</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">durnój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурачить.html>дура́чить</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">duráčitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:одурачить.html>одура́чить</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect"><a href = vnd.unilang:pf.html>pf</a></abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">oduráčitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">дура́чество</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">duráčestvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>ду<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ри́ть</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4c.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дур-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***дурно.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дурной.html>ду́рно</a> (11011)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурной.html>дурно́й</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">durnój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурной.html>ду́рно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dúrno</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl form-of lang-ru comparative-form-of origin-ду́рно" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)ху́же</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl form-of lang-ru comparative-form-of origin-ду́рно" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)дурне́е</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl form-of lang-ru comparative-form-of origin-ду́рно" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)<a href = vnd.unilang:дурень.html>дурне́й</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:badly.html>badly</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:bad.html>bad</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:manner.html>manner</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дурной.html>ду́рно</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:обращаться.html>обраща́ться</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a>)</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>dúrno</b> obraščátʹsja (<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a>)</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:treat.html>treat</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:badly.html>badly</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ill-treat.html>ill-treat</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурной.html>ду́рно</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dúrno</span>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ду́р-но</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>также</a> предикатив; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дур-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-н-о</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>нареч.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дурной.html>дурно́й</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:плохо.html>плохо</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неприятный.html>неприя́тно</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> знач. <a href = vnd.unilang:сказ.html>сказ</a>., <a href = vnd.unilang:кто.html>кому</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кто.html>ке́м</a></span> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:плохой.html>плохо́м</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:самочувствие.html>самочу́вствии</a>, полуобморочном <a href = vnd.unilang:состояние.html>состоя́нии</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:обморок.html>о́бмороке</a></i> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

***дурной.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дурной.html>дурно́й</a> (2662)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*durьnъ</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:equivalent.html>equivalent</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурь.html>дурь</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">durʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-но́й</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурной.html>дурно́й</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">durnój</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)дурне́е</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)<a href = vnd.unilang:дурень.html>дурне́й</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:foolish.html>foolish</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:stupid.html>stupid</a>
<dl><dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonym</a>:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:глупый.html>глу́пый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">glúpyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms antonym"><span class="defdate"><a href = vnd.unilang:antonym.html>Antonym</a>:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:умный.html>у́мный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">úmnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:bad.html>bad</a>
<dl><dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonym</a>:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:плохой.html>плохо́й</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">ploxój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms antonym"><span class="defdate"><a href = vnd.unilang:antonym.html>Antonym</a>:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хороший.html>хоро́ший</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">xoróšij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:ugly.html>ugly</a>
<dl><dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonym</a>:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:некрасивый.html>некраси́вый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nekrasívyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms antonym"><span class="defdate"><a href = vnd.unilang:antonym.html>Antonym</a>:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:красивый.html>краси́вый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">krasívyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:reprehensible.html>reprehensible</a>
<dl><dd><span class="nyms synonym"><span class="defdate"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonym</a>:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:нехороший.html>нехоро́ший</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nexoróšij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></dd>
<dd><span class="nyms antonym"><span class="defdate"><a href = vnd.unilang:antonym.html>Antonym</a>:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:добрый.html>до́брый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dóbryj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дура.html>ду́р</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ныть.html>но́й</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:c.html>c</a>'. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>дурне́е, <a href = vnd.unilang:дурень.html>дурне́й</a>, подурне́е, подурне́й</i>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дур-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ой</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:плохой.html>плохо́й</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неприятный.html>неприя́тный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:скверный.html>скве́рного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:качество.html>ка́чества</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сточный.html>сто́чной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:труба.html>трубе́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кухонный.html>ку́хонной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раковина.html>ра́ковины</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> скопляется <a href = vnd.unilang:больший.html>бо́льшее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:количество.html>коли́чество</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жировой.html>жировы́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отложение.html>отложе́ний</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рые</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:разлагаться.html>разлага́ясь</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:выделять.html>выделя́ют</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; Ю. Лермонтов</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:герой.html>Геро́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:наш.html>на́шего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a>», <span class="example-date">1839-1841</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;"><a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> кратк. ф.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:некрасивый.html>некраси́вый</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:уродливый.html>уро́дливый</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Она</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>была</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***дурость.html

Зализняка).

***дурочка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дурочка.html>ду́рочка</a> (11047)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дура.html>ду́ра</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dúra</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-очка</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-očka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурочка.html>ду́рочка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dúročka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурочка.html>ду́рочки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурочка.html>ду́рочки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурочка.html>ду́рочек</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:masculine.html>masculine</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дурачок.html>дурачо́к</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>Diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дура.html>ду́ра</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dúra</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:female.html>female</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:fool.html>fool</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:idiot.html>idiot</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:imbecile.html>imbecile</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ду́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>роч<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дур-</b>; суффикс: <b>-очк</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дуть.html>ду́тый</a> (28984)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:past.html>past</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:passive.html>passive</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дуть.html>дуть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dutʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дуть.html>ду́тый</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>Прича́стие</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-ду-</b>; суффикс: <b>-т</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>страд. прич. прош. вр.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дуть.html>дуть</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="выступает в роли прилагательного">адъектив.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:изготовленный.html>изгото́вленный</a> дутьём, <a href = vnd.unilang:полый.html>по́лый</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***дуть.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дуть.html>дуть</a> (4081)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:late.html>Late</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*dǫti</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:early.html>Early</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*dъm-ti</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:root.html>root</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*dymъ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:smoke.html>smoke</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <a href = vnd.unilang:cognate.html>Cognate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Russian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:russian.html>Russian</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дым.html>дым</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dym</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/English_language" class="extiw" title="w:English language"><a href = vnd.unilang:english.html>English</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="en"><a href = vnd.unilang:damp.html>damp</a></i>.

annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">naduvátelʹstvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">проду́вка</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">prodúvka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:поддувало.html>поддува́ло</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">podduválo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дуть.html>ду́тый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dútyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:надуть.html>наду́тый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nadútyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:раздутый.html>разду́тый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">razdútyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дуть.html>дуть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 12a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́лы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:дунуть.html>ду́нуть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:выдуть.html>вы́дуть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-ду-</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дуть.html>ду́ть</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 12a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:надуться.html>наду́ться</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-ду-</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:вздуваться.html>вздува́ться</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:распухать.html>распуха́ть</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:три.html>Три</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:день.html>дня</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кожа.html>кожа</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:синяк.html>синяке́</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:дуться.html>ду́лась</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:результат.html>результа́те</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:получиться.html>получи́лась</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:огромный.html>огро́мная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:припухлость.html>припу́хлость</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li>продуваться; <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>быть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:продуваемый.html>продува́емым</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">Почему-то <a href = vnd.unilang:этот.html>э́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:трубочка.html>тру́бочка</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:дуться.html>ду́ется</a></span>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***дух.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>дух</a> (604)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*duxъ</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>дух</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr"><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>dux</a></span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>ду́ха</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>ду́хи</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>ду́хов</a></b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>дух</a></b> (<span title="написание в дореформенной орфографии" style="border-bottom: 1px dotted; cursor: help">дореформ.</span> <span style="font-family: | Palatino Linotype | ">духъ</span>)
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дух-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span> <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;"><a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:устойчивый.html>усто́йчивых</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сочетание.html>сочета́ниях</a></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:дыхание.html>дыха́ние</a> <span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-29" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-29"> |  8 | </a></sup></span><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-30" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-30"> |  8 | </a></sup></span><sup id="cite_ref-31" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-31"> |  8 | </a></sup><span style="display: none"><sup id="cite_ref-32" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-32"> | ▼ 8 | </a></sup></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:волна.html>волну</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:взбираться.html>взбира́ться</a> туда-сюда, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вниз.html>вниз</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:полететь.html>полети́шь</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нутро.html>нутро́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:замирать.html>замира́ет</a>, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>дух</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:захватывать.html>захва́тывает</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2-%D0%9F%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%B9,_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B9_%D0%A1%D0%B8%D0%BB%D1%8B%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Новиков-Прибой, Алексей Силыч"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>. <h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>дух</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дух-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>дух</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. </p>

<p><b>ду<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>хо<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вена.html>ве́н</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ство</b>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ду<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>хо́в<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дух-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ов-к</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***духовный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:духовный.html>духо́вный</a> (2065)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:духовный.html>духо́вный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">duxóvnyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:spiritual.html>spiritual</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:ecclesiastical.html>ecclesiastical</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:религиозный.html>религио́зный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">religióznyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>дух</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:дух.html>dux</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:духовенство.html>духове́нство</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">duxovénstvo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:духовность.html>духо́вность</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">duxóvnostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:духовный.html>духо́вно</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">duxóvno</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>ду<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>хо́в<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дух-</b>; суффикс: <b>-овн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>ду<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>хо<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вой.html>во́й</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1b | .
<a href = vnd.unilang:краткий.html>Кра́ткая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рма</a> муж. р. <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:использоваться.html>испо́льзуется</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:образование.html>образова́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:остальной.html>остальны́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:краткий.html>кра́тких</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рм</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:затруднительный.html>затрудни́тельно</a>.

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>

<p><b>ду<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>хо<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вой.html>во́й</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1b | .
<a href = vnd.unilang:краткий.html>Кра́ткая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рма</a> муж. р. <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:использоваться.html>испо́льзуется</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:образование.html>образова́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:остальной.html>остальны́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:краткий.html>кра́тких</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рм</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:затруднительный.html>затрудни́тельно</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дух-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ов</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ой</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:действовать.html>де́йствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:посредством.html>посре́дством</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нагретый.html>нагре́того</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:воздух.html>воздуха</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пара.html>пара</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="кулинарный термин">кулин.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:приготовить.html>пригото́вленный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:плотный.html>пло́тно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:закрытый.html>закры́том</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сосуд.html>сосу́де</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пара.html>пару</a></a>́ <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:под.html>под</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:действие.html>де́йствием</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пара.html>пара</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кушанье.html>ку́шанье</a>) <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</ol>

***духота.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:духота.html>духота́</a> (10645)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:духота.html>духота́</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">duxotá</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:духота.html>духоты́</a></b>, <i>uncountable</i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:sultriness.html>sultriness</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:closeness.html>closeness</a>, stuffiness, <a href = vnd.unilang:sultry.html>sultry</a> / <a href = vnd.unilang:stuffy.html>stuffy</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:air.html>air</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ду<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>хо<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>та́</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1d |   <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> мн. ч. предположительны <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> неупотребимы.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-дух-</b>; суффикс: <b>-от</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***душ.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душ</a> (18462)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language"><a href = vnd.unilang:french.html>French</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr"><a href = vnd.unilang:douche.html>douche</a></i>.
</p>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душ</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">duš</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>ду́ша</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>ду́ши</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душ.html>ду́шей</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>adjective</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душевой.html>душево́й</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:shower.html>shower</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:device.html>device</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:bath.html>bathing</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:давление.html>давле́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вода.html>воды́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>ду́ше</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:упасть.html>упа́ло</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Davlénije vodý <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> <b>dúše</b> upálo.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:water.html>Water</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:pressure.html>pressure</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:shower.html>shower</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:drop.html>dropped</a>.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:shower.html>shower</a> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:instance.html>instance</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> using <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:shower.html>shower</a></i>)
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:принять.html>приня́ть</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душ</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">prinjátʹ <b>duš</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:take.html>take</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:shower.html>shower</a></b></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душ</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">duš</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr> <abbr title="plural number">pl</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душа́</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">dušá</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душ</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 4a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-душ-</b>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:помещение.html>помеще́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:душ.html>ду́шем</a> [1] <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:принятие.html>приня́тия</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душа</a> [2] <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:встать.html>вста́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пойти.html>пошёл</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душ</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:постоять.html>постоя́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:под.html>под</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жидкий.html>жи́дкой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:теплый.html>тёплой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:струя.html>струёй</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несколько.html>не́сколько</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:минута.html>минут</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A3%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F,_%D0%9B%D1%8E%D0%B4%D0%BC%D0%B8%D0%BB%D0%B0_%D0%95%D0%B2%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%8C%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Улицкая, Людмила Евгеньевна">Л. Е. Улицкая</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:путешествие.html>Путеше́ствие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:седьмой.html>седьму́ю</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сторона.html>сто́рону</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свет.html>све́та</a>», <span class="example-date">2000</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li>рассекатель</li>
<li>—</li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:душевой.html>душева́я</a></li></ol>
</body> 
***душа.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душа</a> (236)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">доуша</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">duša</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:soul.html>soul</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*duša</i>.
</p>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душа́</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">dušá</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>души́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>ду́ши</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душ</a></b>)
</p>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бездушный.html>безду́шный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">bezdúšnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:великодуший.html>великоду́шие</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">velikodúšije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:великодушный.html>великоду́шный</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">velikodúšnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">двоеду́шный</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">dvojedúšnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ду<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ша.html>ша́</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 4d'  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выражение.html>выраже́нии</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:говорить.html>говори́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душа́м</a>» <a href = vnd.unilang:ударение.html>ударе́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:расходиться.html>расхо́дится</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:схема.html>схе́мой</a> 4d'. <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сочетание.html>сочета́ниях</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>ти́па</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душу</a>», «<a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душу</a>» <a href = vnd.unilang:ударение.html>ударе́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мочь.html>мо́жет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:падать.html>па́дать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>предло́г</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a> «<i><a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>душа</a></i>» <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́том</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:превращаться.html>превраща́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> клитику.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-душ-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
